title: Free Skin On New Champion Select?
body: When i was playing a game with friend my team told me to play classic skin at last moment I picked Snow day Gnar to classic and for some reason i got Dino Gnar without purchase and I checked gifting history no one sent me noting and i check my owned skin as Gnar and it says that i don't own Dino Gnar

replies.body: This is the second topic i've read on this. Seems to be a skin indexing error with the new champ select.

Heya FireDeMage -

Thanks for the report. This is a known issue that should now be resolved.
